channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Yuzhen Blog

item.title: projects
item.description: In addition to all the default Hugo shortcodes, Blowfish adds a few extras for additional functionality. Alert # alert outputs its contents as a stylised message box within your article. It’s useful for drawing attention to important information that you don’t want the reader to miss.

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: In addition to all the default Hugo shortcodes, Blowfish adds a few extras for additional functionality. Alert # alert outputs its contents as a stylised message box within your article. It’s useful for drawing attention to important information that you don’t want the reader to miss.

item.title: Setting Up a Personal Blog—1. Installing Hugo, Configuring the Blowfish Theme
item.description: Why Rebuild # Recently, I’ve been preparing for the AWS SAA exam and learning new technologies through side projects. I want to document this journey. Since all the previous blog files were on an old computer in China and the GitHub repository only had public content, I decided to restart my blog as a way to practice writing and keep records.
